description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony and installation of three roof lights to front roof slope, following removal of two roof dormers; alteration to first floor rear elevation involving insertion of Juliet balcony; alteration to side elevation involving insertion of a window; single storey rear extension, following demolition of existing rear addition
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
2.	The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.

3.	The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012).
4. 	The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the principle elevation roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
5.	No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D3 of the London Plan (2021).
